verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
This <WH2063> shall be the law <WH8451> of the leper <WH6879> in the day <WH3117> of his cleansing: <WH2893> He shall be brought <WH935> to the priest: <WH3548>

And the priest <WH3548> shall go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of the camp; <WH4264> and the priest <WH3548> shall look, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> if the plague <WH5061> of leprosy <WH6883> be healed <WH7495> in the leper; <WH6879>

Then shall the priest <WH3548> command <WH6680> to take <WH3947> for him that is to be cleansed <WH2891> two <WH8147> birds <WH6833> alive <WH2416> and clean, <WH2889> and cedar <WH730> wood, <WH6086> and scarlet, <WH8144> <WH8438> and hyssop: <WH231>
And the priest <WH3548> shall command <WH6680> that one <WH259> of the birds <WH6833> be killed <WH7819> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627> over <WH5921> running <WH2416> water: <WH4325>

As for the living <WH2416> bird, <WH6833> he shall take <WH3947> it, and the cedar <WH730> wood, <WH6086> and the scarlet, <WH8144> <WH8438> and the hyssop, <WH231> and shall dip <WH2881> them and the living <WH2416> bird <WH6833> in the blood <WH1818> of the bird <WH6833> that was killed <WH7819> over <WH5921> the running <WH2416> water: <WH4325>

And he shall sprinkle <WH5137> on him that is to be cleansed <WH2891> from the leprosy <WH6883> seven <WH7651> times, <WH6471> and shall pronounce him clean, <WH2891> and shall let the living <WH2416> bird <WH6833> loose <WH7971> into <WH5921> the open <WH6440> field. <WH7704>

And he that is to be cleansed <WH2891> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes, <WH899> and shave <WH1548> off all <WH3605> his hair, <WH8181> and wash <WH7364> himself in water, <WH4325> that he may be clean: <WH2891> and after <WH310> that he shall come <WH935> into <WH413> the camp, <WH4264> and shall tarry <WH3427> abroad <WH2351> out of his tent <WH168> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

But it shall be on the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> that he shall shave <WH1548> all <WH3605> his hair <WH8181> off his head <WH7218> and his beard <WH2206> and his eyebrows, <WH1354> <WH5869> even all <WH3605> his hair <WH8181> he shall shave <WH1548> off: and he shall wash <WH3526> his clothes, <WH899> also he shall wash <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> in water, <WH4325> and he shall be clean. <WH2891>

And on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> he shall take <WH3947> two <WH8147> he lambs <WH3532> without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> and one <WH259> ewe <WH3535> lamb <WH3535> of the first <WH1323> year <WH8141> without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> and three <WH7969> tenth <WH6241> deals of fine flour <WH5560> for a meat offering, mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and one <WH259> log <WH3849> of oil. <WH8081>

And the priest <WH3548> that makes him clean <WH2891> shall present <WH5975> the man <WH376> that is to be made <WH6213> clean, <WH2891> and those things, before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> one <WH259> he lamb, <WH3532> and offer <WH7126> him for a trespass <WH817> offering, and the log <WH3849> of oil, <WH8081> and wave <WH5130> them for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And he shall slay <WH7819> the lamb <WH3532> in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> he shall kill <WH7819> the sin <WH2403> offering and the burnt <WH5930> offering, in the holy <WH6944> place: <WH4725> for as the sin <WH2403> offering is the priest's, <WH3548> so is the trespass <WH817> offering: it is most <WH6944> holy: <WH6944>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> some of the blood <WH1818> of the trespass <WH817> offering, and the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> it on the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of him that is to be cleansed, <WH2891> and on the thumb <WH931> of his right <WH3233> hand, <WH3027> and on the great toe <WH931> of his right <WH3233> foot: <WH7272>
And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> some of the log <WH3849> of oil, <WH8081> and pour <WH3332> it into <WH5921> the palm <WH3709> of his own <WH3548> left <WH8042> hand: <WH8042>

And the priest <WH3548> shall dip <WH2881> his right <WH3233> finger <WH676> in the oil <WH8081> that is in his left <WH8042> hand, <WH3709> and shall sprinkle <WH5137> of the oil <WH8081> with his finger <WH676> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And of the rest <WH3499> of the oil <WH8081> that is in his hand <WH3709> shall the priest <WH3548> put <WH5414> on the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of him that is to be cleansed, <WH2891> and on the thumb <WH931> of his right <WH3233> hand, <WH3027> and on the great toe <WH931> of his right <WH3233> foot, <WH7272> on the blood <WH1818> of the trespass <WH817> offering:

And the remnant <WH3498> of the oil <WH8081> that is in the priest's <WH3548> hand <WH3709> he shall pour <WH5414> on the head <WH7218> of him that is to be cleansed: <WH2891> and the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for him before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH6213> the sin <WH2403> offering, and make an atonement <WH3722> for him that is to be cleansed <WH2891> from his uncleanness; <WH2932> and afterward <WH310> he shall kill <WH7819> the burnt <WH5930> offering:

And the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH5927> the burnt <WH5930> offering <WH4503> and the meat offering on the altar: <WH4196> and the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for him, and he shall be clean. <WH2891>

And if <WH518> he be poor, <WH1800> and cannot <WH369> <WH3027> get <WH5381> so much; then he shall take <WH3947> one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> for a trespass <WH817> offering to be waved, <WH8573> to make an atonement <WH3722> for him, and one <WH259> tenth <WH6241> deal of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meat offering, <WH4503> and a log <WH3849> of oil; <WH8081>

And two <WH8147> turtledoves, <WH8449> or <WH176> two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons, <WH3123> such as he is able <WH5381> to get; <WH5381> and the one <WH259> shall be a sin <WH2403> offering, and the other <WH259> a burnt <WH5930> offering.

And he shall bring <WH935> them on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> for his cleansing <WH2893> to the priest, <WH3548> to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the lamb <WH3532> of the trespass <WH817> offering, and the log <WH3849> of oil, <WH8081> and the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And he shall kill <WH7819> the lamb <WH3532> of the trespass <WH817> offering, and the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> some of the blood <WH1818> of the trespass <WH817> offering, and put <WH5414> it on the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of him that is to be cleansed, <WH2891> and on the thumb <WH931> of his right <WH3233> hand, <WH3027> and on the great toe <WH931> of his right <WH3233> foot: <WH7272>
And the priest <WH3548> shall pour <WH3332> of the oil <WH8081> into <WH5921> the palm <WH3709> of his own <WH3548> left <WH8042> hand: <WH8042>

And the priest <WH3548> shall sprinkle <WH5137> with his right <WH3233> finger <WH676> some of the oil <WH8081> that is in his left <WH8042> hand <WH3709> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> of the oil <WH8081> that is in his hand <WH3709> on the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of him that is to be cleansed, <WH2891> and on the thumb <WH931> of his right <WH3233> hand, <WH3027> and on the great toe <WH931> of his right <WH3233> foot, <WH7272> on the place <WH4725> of the blood <WH1818> of the trespass <WH817> offering:

And the rest <WH3498> of the oil <WH8081> that is in the priest's <WH3548> hand <WH3709> he shall put <WH5414> on the head <WH7218> of him that is to be cleansed, <WH2891> to make an atonement <WH3722> for him before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>
And he shall offer <WH6213> the one <WH259> of the turtledoves, <WH8449> or <WH176> of the young <WH1121> pigeons, <WH3123> such as he can get; <WH5381>

Even such as he is able <WH5381> to get, <WH5381> the one <WH259> for a sin <WH2403> offering, and the other <WH259> for a burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH4503> with the meat offering: and the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for him that is to be cleansed <WH2891> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of him in whom <WH834> is the plague <WH5061> of leprosy, <WH6883> whose <WH834> hand <WH3027> is not able <WH5381> to get <WH5381> that which pertains to his cleansing. <WH2893>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

When <WH3588> you be come <WH935> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> I give <WH5414> to you for a possession, <WH272> and I put <WH5414> the plague <WH5061> of leprosy <WH6883> in a house <WH1004> of the land <WH776> of your possession; <WH272>
And he that ownes the house <WH1004> shall come <WH935> and tell <WH5046> the priest, <WH3548> saying, <WH559> It seems <WH7200> to me there is as it were a plague <WH5061> in the house: <WH1004>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall command <WH6680> that they empty <WH6437> the house, <WH1004> before <WH2962> the priest <WH3548> go <WH935> into it to see <WH7200> the plague, <WH5061> that all <WH3605> that is in the house <WH1004> be not made unclean: <WH2930> and afterward <WH310> <WH3651> the priest <WH3548> shall go <WH935> in to see <WH7200> the house: <WH1004>

And he shall look <WH7200> on the plague, <WH5061> and, behold, <WH2009> if the plague <WH5061> be in the walls <WH7023> of the house <WH1004> with hollow <WH8258> strakes, <WH8258> greenish <WH3422> or <WH176> reddish, <WH125> which in sight <WH4758> are lower <WH8217> than <WH4480> the wall; <WH7023>
Then the priest <WH3548> shall go <WH3318> out of the house <WH1004> to the door <WH6607> of the house, <WH1004> and shut <WH5462> up the house <WH1004> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117>

And the priest <WH3548> shall come <WH7725> again <WH7725> the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> and shall look: <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> if the plague <WH5061> be spread <WH6581> in the walls <WH7023> of the house; <WH1004>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall command <WH6680> that they take <WH2502> away the stones <WH68> in which <WH834> the plague <WH5061> is, and they shall cast <WH7993> them into <WH413> an unclean <WH2931> place <WH4725> without <WH2351> the city: <WH5892>

And he shall cause the house <WH1004> to be scraped <WH7106> within <WH1004> round <WH5439> about, and they shall pour <WH8210> out the dust <WH6083> that they scrape <WH7096> off without <WH2351> the city <WH5892> into <WH413> an unclean <WH2931> place: <WH4725>

And they shall take <WH3947> other <WH312> stones, <WH68> and put <WH935> them in the place <WH8478> of those stones; <WH68> and he shall take <WH3947> other <WH312> mortar, <WH6083> and shall plaster <WH2902> the house. <WH1004>

And if <WH518> the plague <WH5061> come <WH7725> again, <WH7725> and break <WH6524> out in the house, <WH1004> after <WH310> that he has taken <WH2502> away the stones, <WH68> and after <WH310> he has scraped <WH7096> the house, <WH1004> and after <WH310> it is plastered; <WH2902>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall come <WH935> and look, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> if the plague <WH5061> be spread <WH6581> in the house, <WH1004> it is a fretting <WH3992> leprosy <WH6883> in the house; <WH1004> it is unclean. <WH2931>

And he shall break <WH5422> down <WH5422> the house, <WH1004> the stones <WH68> of it, and the timber <WH6086> thereof, and all <WH3605> the mortar <WH6083> of the house; <WH1004> and he shall carry <WH3318> them forth <WH3318> out of the city <WH5892> into <WH413> an unclean <WH2931> place. <WH4725>
Moreover he that goes <WH935> into <WH413> the house <WH1004> all <WH3605> the while that it is shut <WH5462> up shall be unclean <WH2930> until <WH5704> the even. <WH6153>
And he that lies <WH7901> in the house <WH1004> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes; <WH899> and he that eats <WH398> in the house <WH1004> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes. <WH899>

And if <WH518> the priest <WH3548> shall come <WH935> in, and look <WH7200> on it, and, behold, <WH2009> the plague <WH5061> has not spread <WH6581> in the house, <WH1004> after <WH310> the house <WH1004> was plastered: <WH2902> then the priest <WH3548> shall pronounce the house <WH1004> clean, <WH2891> because <WH3588> the plague <WH5061> is healed. <WH7495>
And he shall take <WH3947> to cleanse <WH2398> the house <WH1004> two <WH8147> birds, <WH6833> and cedar <WH730> wood, <WH6086> and scarlet, <WH8144> <WH8438> and hyssop: <WH231>
And he shall kill <WH7819> the one <WH259> of the birds <WH6833> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627> over <WH5921> running <WH2416> water: <WH4325>

And he shall take <WH3947> the cedar <WH730> wood, <WH6086> and the hyssop, <WH231> and the scarlet, <WH8144> <WH8438> and the living <WH2416> bird, <WH6833> and dip <WH2881> them in the blood <WH1818> of the slain <WH7819> bird, <WH6833> and in the running <WH2416> water, <WH4325> and sprinkle <WH5137> the house <WH1004> seven <WH7651> times: <WH6471>

And he shall cleanse <WH2398> the house <WH1004> with the blood <WH1818> of the bird, <WH6833> and with the running <WH2416> water, <WH4325> and with the living <WH2416> bird, <WH6833> and with the cedar <WH730> wood, <WH6086> and with the hyssop, <WH231> and with the scarlet: <WH8144>

But he shall let go <WH7971> the living <WH2416> bird <WH6833> out of the city <WH5892> into <WH413> the open <WH6440> fields, <WH7704> and make an atonement <WH3722> for the house: <WH1004> and it shall be clean. <WH2891>
This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> for all <WH3605> manner of plague <WH5061> of leprosy, <WH6883> and scale, <WH5424>
And for the leprosy <WH6883> of a garment, <WH899> and of a house, <WH1004>
And for a rising, <WH7613> and for a scab, <WH5597> and for a bright <WH934> spot: <WH934>
To teach <WH3384> when <WH3117> it is unclean, <WH2931> and when <WH3117> it is clean: <WH2889> this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of leprosy. <WH6883>
